outOfDateNotice.outdated:
**Functional Purpose**: Indicates that the displayed content is no longer current.
**UI Location**: Iteration summary, next to a warning icon.
**When Users See This**: When the iteration data shown is out of date.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Outdated"
analysisStatusSummary.automatedComments:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for an icon representing automated comments.
**UI Location**: Iteration summary, within the analysis status section.
**When Users See This**: When automated comments are displayed in the analysis summary.
**Technical Context**: Used as `alt` attribute for an icon. Must be concise.
**Current English**: "Automated comments"
analysisStatusSummary.essential:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for a count of essential automated comments.
**UI Location**: Iteration summary, within the analysis status section.
**When Users See This**: When essential automated comments are present.
**Technical Context**: Used as `title` attribute for a `div` element.
**Current English**: "Essential"
analysisStatusSummary.actionable:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for a count of actionable automated comments.
**UI Location**: Iteration summary, within the analysis status section.
**When Users See This**: When actionable automated comments are present.
**Technical Context**: Used as `title` attribute for a `div` element.
**Current English**: "Actionable"
analysisStatusSummary.other:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for a count of other (non-actionable) automated comments.
**UI Location**: Iteration summary, within the analysis status section.
**When Users See This**: When non-actionable automated comments are present.
**Technical Context**: Used as `title` attribute for a `div` element.
**Current English**: "Other"
